item.title: Map the metadata of your YAML
item.description: yaml-dredger I thought it would be useful to analyze the structure of YAML files at scale. YAML gets used for everything — APIs, configurations, Kubernetes, data specs — and often no one really knows what’s in the files. This script crawls a folder of YAML and gives you a kind of map: what entities exist, what fields they have, and where they show up. It’s not pretty — but it works.
